mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card (cd_idx, cd_color, cd_design, cd_approve, m_idx, cd_apply_date) VALUES (card_seq.nextval, #{cd_color}, #{cd_design}, DEFAULT, #{m_idx}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT m_idx, m_english_first_name, m_english_last_name FROM member WHERE m_idx = #{m_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE card SET cd_number = #{cd_number}, cd_cvc = #{cd_cvc}, cd_pwd = #{cd_pwd}, cd_expired_date = #{cd_expired_date}, cd_apply_status = '신청완료' WHERE cd_idx = #{cd_idx}
